Articles.Content:
That advancing army is that of The Google Picture War.

Turn's out the hill has always been the property of Deepmind Technologies Ltd., and Google just bought Deepmind.

Make a guess as to whose hill it is now.
After 7.5 million years, Deep Thought calculates the answer to Life. The answer is that the hill belongs to me now. Resistance is useless!

Well, I distract you as you trip on a rock and you fly up into the sky, never to come back down.

My hill.

It's Chinese New Year tomorrow. After a bit of time travel I have the world end, you do not survive.

MEIN.

My ghost comes back to haunt you and you become insane, and you kill yourself.

My hill.

Ghosts? Vacuum cleaner!

My hill.

Vacuum cleaner ->bucket of water you were elecktrocuted and died!

My Hill!

I whoop yo ---

My hill.
See you later Britons...

I supply the redcoats with AK-47's.

My town.

AK-47s don't exist in 1781! Therefore your shipments are void.

The Americans ended their revolution by forcing Cornwallis to surrender (he was commanding the forces in Yorktown). Americans now held Yorktown (there is a hill nearby).

I build a time machine to travel back to yorktown with the technology and machines to mass produce cartridge rounds and breech-loading, percussion-cap firing, fully automatic rifles and sell them to both sides.

My Money Hill. $$$$
Psh. Like you can be King of the Hill when you can't even get a rocket off the pad. I fire you and take over the hill with my fully operational battle sta-er, I mean rocketship.

I use my new found money to hire the best and brightest rocket scientists of the day (such as William Congreve). We use the rockets we develop to shoot down your flying house.

My hill.

I backstab you and your rocket scientist, taking over the newly created crater.

My hill.

I crash a srb into you and fix the hill.

MINE.

The remaining scientists that I hired develop FTL rockets, name their FTL engine after me, and go find a new planet that can sustain life. They then leave a planet busting nuke behind and take themselves to find the best hill on the new planet to begin colonization on.

My Planet, Hill, and everything else.

Nope.avi, I call some dolphins to get the backup planet.

It is now mine.

hello guys the false mod is back and ready to make another hill have the auto resetting ability so to avoid a long post here

I dig into the heart of the hill and replace the magic reset button and make it the very being on the hill so it can't be removed at all. then place you back on top of the hill and strap you to it.

its your hill but i have the reset button and its encoded to only me and odin.

I drill the hill and flooded the holes with nitroglycerin, then walk out carefully. Mua ha ha.

Whoever-claim-he-own-the-hill's hill. Watch out, the holes are quite big and one false step could cause the hill to tumble. (Nitroglycerin is very explosive.)

Edited February 3, 2014 by Designer225
I send a brave robot to the hill. He explodes with the nitroglycerin. Now that the hill is not explosive anymore, I claim the hill.

because the nitroglycerin and robot blew up and left nothing behind, you can have your imaginary hill. I claim the crater and start drilling a deep hole in the bottom of it.

My crater/hole.
My metallic hill.

due to the hill exploding and a giant metallic object crashing in to the crater the hill resets. and i plant a tree on top right beside the flag pole.

you still have it

I burn your flag and put mine on the flagpole.

Now it is my hill.
